NODE.title: moveSelectItem
NODE.field:
The is is used by the nodegroup editor to move items in the list up and down. 'name' is the name of the <select> list box that contains the group list. 'op' is either -1, 0, or 1. -1 moves the selected item up in the list, 1 moves down, and 0 deletes the selected item.
maintainValues() is called by moveSelectItem(). It is used to maintain a comma delimited list of node id's in a hidden form field. This list represents the current state of the select. That way, when the form is submitted, the hidden form field contains the list of id's for the edited select list.
